item.title: Great Victory - A historic record for India against South Africa
item.description: What a victory has it been for the “Men in White”. This is India’s biggest victory over South Africa by an innings and 137 runs. To add icing on the cake this is India’s eleventh consecutive home series win which is a new world record.
